name: Harshita Kaur Chugh
college: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

full_output.summary: With solid technical skills, I have over 2+ months of experience in machine learning with a passion for solving complex problems. I thrive in challenging environments and enjoy contributing to innovative projects while staying updated on the latest advancements.

education.school: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

projects.name: Meta Stock Price Predictor
projects.description: Developed an RNN with LSTM layers using Keras to predict Meta stock trends from a 10-year dataset (approx. 2,500 trading days), achieving a trend alignment accuracy of 85%. Predicted stock trends for July 2022, with the model's forecasts closely mirroring actual price movements, resulting in a 90% alignment in trend direction. Focused on trend direction rather than exact values, with the model accurately capturing 80% of the major upward and downward movements in stock prices.

projects.name: Sales Dashboard
projects.description: Sales Analysis: Reviewed 4 years of U.S. office item sales with state and subcategory comparisons. Interactive Dashboards: Created dashboard for real-time trend and year-over-year sales analysis. Enhanced Insights: Used advanced visualizations to boost decision-making efficiency by 30%.

experiences.description: Georeferenced meteorological data using netCDF4, aligning observations across various stations for precise spatial analysis. Extracted radar reflectivity data to calculate rainfall estimates. Developed a Random Forest model to forecast rainfall using historical and reflectivity data. Validated model accuracy by comparing predictions with rain gauge measurements. Improved forecasting accuracy and understanding of rainfall patterns, showcasing strong problem-solving abilities in meteorology.

full_output.name: Harshita Kaur Chugh
